Name: Icy Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Fire-type moves from damaging Ice-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Ice-type Pokémon.  You can get an Icy Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Clear Silk, an Icy Dust, and an Icy Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
